person.persName: Green V. Hall (Powell County, Kentucky, carpenter and soldier)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, carpenter and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Hall. Father of Melvina Hall, John Thompson Hall, and Jiney Hall. Carpenter in Powell County in 1860. Captain in 24th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment, U.S.A. from January 1862 to January 1865. Postmaster in Stanton, Kentucky, from 1865 to 1871.
